text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, Alloh taolo sumoro [dar hole ki muhrim hasted] ʙa cize az sikori [sahroi], ki dar dastrasi sumo va najzahojaton ʙosad, meozmojad, to ma'lum dorad, ci kase dar nihon az U metarsad. Pas, har ki ʙa'd az in [ozmun] az had darguzarad [va dar holi hac jo umra sikor kunad], azoʙi dardnok [dar pes] dorad
